description: [P.A.S. Webshell](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0598) can use predefined users and passwords to execute brute force attacks against SSH, FTP, POP3, MySQL, MSSQL, and PostgreSQL services.(Citation: ANSSI Sandworm January 2021)

external_references.description: ANSSI. (2021, January 27). SANDWORM INTRUSION SET CAMPAIGN TARGETING CENTREON SYSTEMS. Retrieved March 30, 2021.
